attributes.action: stop raising taxes on fuel, income and local councils beyond the rate of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the taxes are now becoming so high that many of us can barely afford to live. with the latest rise in council tax affecting many people in england, who have also been hit by electricity, gas and oil prices rising; nearly 80% of our income goes to the government AFTER income /PAYE. Give us a break and make it fair. Our incomes do not rise at this rate.
